name: paralanguage
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the ways in which people show what they mean other than by the words they use, for example by their tone of voice, or by making sounds with the breath: The study of paralanguage deals with the non-verbal qualities of speech, which include pitch, amplitude, rate, and voice quality.
